<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Defensive Roll](/Feats.aspx?ID=587) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 188 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per 10 minutes

**Trigger**
A physical attack would reduce you to 0 Hit Points.

</column>

---

Dropping into a roll to disperse the force of the blow, you can partially evade a lethal attack and stay conscious. You take half damage from the triggering attack.
name: Defensive Roll
